Uncertainty for Gisborne after Simeon Brown’s speed limit reduction reversal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/uncertainty-for-gisborne-after-simeon-browns-speed-limit-reduction-reversal/VPFAEYOGV5FLRJSCXK7RBRMTXM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/uncertainty-for-gisborne-after-simeon-browns-speed-limit-reduction-reversal/VPFAEYOGV5FLRJSCXK7RBRMTXM/ Zita Campbell, Local Democracy ReporterGisborne implemented reduced speed limits in July, supported by public consultation. Thu, 21 Nov 2024 03:14:32 +0000 Minister of Transport Simeon Brown says the previous Government’s approach to road safety led to untargeted speed limit reductions but Gisborne District Council says it “did not apply speed limits in a blanket way,” and implemented new speed limits following two years of consultation.

Thu, 21 Nov 2024 03:00:51 +0000 Gisborne teenager Zoe Abbott-Raggett with proud parents Kate Abbott and Dave Raggett after a brilliant final year at Iona College ended with multiple awards at the school's prizegiving, including joint runner-up to dux. Photo / Richard Furhoff Photography
